original_title: First school term of 2024 to begin next Monday
original_body_lines: The Ministry of Education has issued a special notice announcing the dates to commence the first term of government and government-approved private schools for 2024.
Accordingly, the first phase of the first term of the 2024 academic year is scheduled to begin next Monday (Feb.19).
The third term of the academic year 2023 will end tomorrow (Feb.16).
